overview: GPT-5.1, GPT-5.1-Codex, and GPT-5.1-Codex-Mini—the full suite of OpenAI’s latest 5.1-series models—are now rolling out in public preview in GitHub Copilot.

detailed_explanation.title: Overview
bullets: GPT-5.1, GPT-5.1-Codex, and GPT-5.1-Codex-Mini—the full suite of OpenAI’s latest 5.1-series models—are now rolling out in public preview in GitHub Copilot.

detailed_explanation.title: Availability in GitHub Copilot
bullets: OpenAI GPT-5.1, GPT-5.1-Codex, and GPT-5.1-Codex-Mini will be available to Copilot Pro, Pro+, Business, and Enterprise.
Different models have different areas of use and availability in the product:
Visual Studio Code in all modes: chat, ask, edit, agent
JetBrains in all modes: ask, edit, agent
Xcode in all modes: ask, agent
Eclipse in all modes: ask, agent
Visual Studio Code versions 1.104.1 and later, all modes: chat, ask, edit, agent

detailed_explanation.title: Enabling access
bullets: Enterprise and Business plans : Administrators must enable the OpenAI GPT-5.1, GPT-5.1-Codex, or GPT-5.1-Codex-Mini policy in Copilot settings. Once enabled, users in that organization will see the respective model in the Copilot Chat model picker.
Pro and Pro+ plans : Users can enable the model by selecting it in the model picker and confirming the one-time prompt.
Bring your own key : Select Manage Models from the picker, choose OpenAI GPT-5.1, GPT-5.1-Codex, or GPT-5.1-Codex-Mini, and enter your API key when prompted.

detailed_explanation.title: Learn more
bullets: To explore all models available in GitHub Copilot, see our documentation on models and get started with Copilot.

detailed_explanation.title: Share your feedback
bullets: Join the GitHub Community to share your feedback.

impact: GPT-5.1, GPT-5.1-Codex, and GPT-5.1-Codex-Mini—the full suite of OpenAI’s latest 5.1-series models—are now rolling out in public preview in GitHub Copilot.
